body.name: Kidirect 69" White Couch, Loveseat Sofa, Couches for Living Room, Comfy Sofas for Living Room 3min No Tool Fast Assembly, Small Couch for Bedroom, Modern Velvet Sofa Couch for Apartment Office
features: 💓𝟔𝟗𝐢𝐧 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐄𝐧𝐨𝐮𝐠𝐡 𝐭𝐨 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐄𝐱𝐡𝐚𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐁𝐨𝐝𝐲🎁 Don't hesitate, just collapse on the comfy beige white velvet couch when you're tired, and your fatigue will disappear in no time. The sofa's filling density reaches 32D, which is very fluffy, evenly releases pressure, and is soft but not easy to collapse. When you nestle in the loveseat sofa, it feels like being in the arms of a lover, warm and comfortable, and even the loudest noise will turn into a lullaby. The beige couch is a great Christmas gift for your family. They can take a nap, watch movies, read, or play games on the living room sofa and enjoy their leisure time.

💓𝟑-𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥-𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧🎁 From now on, you don't have to worry about assembling the love seat sofa. You will be surprised to find that the beige sofa couch can be easily assembled by only 2 adult women in just 3 minutes. If you are installing alone, it will take 10 minutes. Why can our sofas achieve quick and tool-free assembly? To bring you convenience, we have upgraded and optimized the assembly method of the sofas for the living room, using a plug-in design, which simplifies the assembly steps and reduces the difficulty. It only takes 4 steps to complete the assembly. The sofa also makes Valentine's Day and birthday gifts for her/him.

💓𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐲 𝐕𝐞𝐥𝐯𝐞𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐮𝐜𝐡 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝟐 𝐏𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐄𝐦𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐘𝐨𝐮🎁 Just think back to the feeling of touching your cute furry pet, and you will understand how great our loveseat sofa fabric feels! When you touch the sofa, it feels like stroking your little pet, and the wonderful skin-friendly touch makes you love it. The Christmas sofa uses high-quality and skin-friendly velvet fabric, which is soft, delicate, wear-resistant, and not easy to shed. At the same time, the Christmas couches come with 2 full and comfortable square pillows, which you can hug or use to decorate your sofa.

💓𝐂𝐨𝐳𝐲 𝐒𝐨𝐟𝐚 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐁𝐞𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐦 𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐬🎁 This compact sofa effortlessly enhances the quality of your living space, making it the perfect choice for small areas. You'll be pleasantly surprised by the transformation it brings to your living room, bedroom, home office, guest room, game room, or apartment, making your home both comfortable and cozy. Additionally, its stylish and refined color seamlessly blends with various home decor styles. Don't wait any longer; seize the opportunity to own it and indulge in the ultimate comfort!

💓𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐌𝐚𝐱𝐢𝐦𝐮𝐦 𝐨𝐟 𝟕𝟎𝟎𝐥𝐛 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐧 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝟑 𝐀𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐬🎁 Are you still worried that the beige couch will shake and affect your experience during use? Now you can rest assured that you can play and jump on the sofa boldly, and the sofa is still stable. Made of high-quality and sturdy solid wood for the sofa frame and legs, the wood texture is fine and delicate. With great support and a stable structure, It can support a maximum weight of 700LB and stably support you and your family's happiness. (Sofa size: 69" W x 29"D x 33"H)

💓𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲 𝐀𝐟𝐭𝐞𝐫-𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞e🎁 We attach great importance to the customer's shopping experience. No matter what problems you encounter, please contact us in time, we will give you a satisfactory solution.

🔔Note 1🔔Install the Back Frame to the Sofa Pedestal Please 𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐟𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐩𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐥𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐛𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐚𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐚𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞. 𝐔𝐬𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐥𝐞𝐠 𝐭𝐨 𝐩𝐮𝐬𝐡 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐢𝐧𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐝, 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬.

🔔Note 2🔔It takes about 𝟏𝟎 minutes for the backrest and pillow to fluff up. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐨𝐟𝐚 𝐢𝐬 𝐦𝐚𝐝𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐯𝐞𝐭 𝐟𝐚𝐛𝐫𝐢𝐜 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐢𝐧 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧. 𝐓𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐞, 𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐰𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐧 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐮𝐜𝐡. 𝐀𝐟𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟒-𝟒𝟖 𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐬, 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐰𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐚𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐟𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐜𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐨𝐧 𝐫𝐞𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐬.

productInformation.name: Assembly Instructions
productInformation.value: ✨3 Minutes Free Tool Fast Assembly by Only 2 Adults✨

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Elegant Couch for Your Office The couch can be placed in your office for your own enjoyment or to help you receive guests. Cozy Couch for Bedroom This small couch effortlessly enhances the quality of your living space, perfect for your bedroom. Comfy Couch for Living Room 69" white velvet couch is the perfect addition to your living room. Couch for Family Study Room When you feel tired from taking care of business, you can immediately rest on the couch. Next page 1 Beige Couch for Office 2 Cozy Couch for Bedroom 3 Couches for Living Room 4 Couch for Study Room

Previous page 7.5-inch Sofa Leg The 7.5-inch leg height of the sofa allows the robotic vacuum to easily pass through and clean. 32D Filling Density Sofa cushion filling density reaches 32D, very comfortable as if lying on the clouds. Modern Design Style The armrests of the sofa adopt modern design concepts and are more elegant and stylish. Next page 1 Skin-Friendly Fabric 2 Easy to Clean 3 Fluffy Backrest 4 Elegant and Stylish

What to Look for When You Install a Backrest Frame？ Please align the backrest frame with the connection point on the armrest, and slide both sides in at the same time. Use your leg to push the armrest inward, in the process. What Should I Do If the Beige Velvet Couch I Receive Has Wrinkles on the Surface? The sofa is made of velvet fabric and is transported in compression. Therefore, please smooth out the wrinkles on the surface when you receive the couch. After 24-48 hours, the wrinkles will gradually smooth out as the filling cotton rebounds. How Many People Do You Need to Assemble the Sofa Couch and Do You Need to Use Additional Tools? 3 Minutes no tools required fast assembly by only 2 adults. What Is the Weight Capacity of The Couch and Is it Big Enough for 2 People? 700LB Load, easily accommodates 2-3 adults. What Are the Materials of Each Part of the Couch？ The frame of the sofa Is made of solid wood, the filling is made of cotton and silk, the fabric Is soft and skin-friendly velvet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the prince definitely!
reviews.reviewText: I am a little bit worried about buying a sofa online because you don’t know whether it’s soft or strong enough after being put together. For this sofa that cost less than $200, I decided to give it a try. This is a great buy, I am happy I purchased it. It was easy to put together. I did it by myself,however,some parts would have been easier with help. It looks exactly as pictured and is super comfortable. It is very sturdy and won’t shake after being put together. Even if three adults sit on it,there is enough space. Because the pillows are vacuum packed,it has a little bit wrinkled when you first open it. But when you leaning on it,it is extremely comfortable,so it doesn’t bother me. The four corners of the sofa are a little bit higher than ordinary ones,which makes it easier for me to clean the dust under the sofa. And I like the color a lot,it’s a bit like Nordic style. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this! You won’t regret it
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant with the limited reviews but I am pleased! At this price point I’m so happy with the purchase. I wanted a small sofa for my office and this is it! The material is extremely soft. The picture I took is fresh out the box so I expect the pillows to fluff a bit more and see some of the wrinkles to go away. It was as easy to put together as advertised with no tools. Took about 8 minutes including unboxing. It is comfy, not sink in comfy, but enough for me to read or watch a show comfortably. I could easily lay out on it although I’m on the shorter side. It’s beautiful though and feels sturdy. I recommend this for sure if you are on a budget!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this to look good and be comfortable enough to relax on. It's great! We love it and had basically no issues setting it up or with the fabric being wrinkled as seen in some other posts. It is chic and affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So the color and size was good for the small space I used it for staging a house unfortunately it’s not suitable for any daily use as the couch doesn’t attach together well so we we’re having to reattach the couch several times it will not stay basically no one can sit on it , I would return if it were possible because I had to put a sign saying do not sit on couch I was worried it would fall apart, I did not expect much for the price but at least if I wasn’t if fear of it collapsing then it would have been ok for my house staging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for...
reviews.reviewText: I had a hard time assembling this alone... Once I got a good seating and support I was able to successfully get everything to go in.Dont waste your time trying to drop the arms into the couch. You have to drop the couch into the arms.Im 240lbs, and sturdiness wise, I'll give it a 7/10Comfort wise, If feels good enough for to relax with additional pillows and take a nap possibly but it does get uncomfortable due to the seats not being long enough and the padding isn't good because you can literally feel the frame.Wouldn't recommend if your plus size.I got this couch as something temporary till I find what I really want.I'd say this couch is good for small places, and someone looking for something affordable.I was lucky enough to get it on sale for $150 so i cant really be mad.Didn't require any tools, would be better with help, but other than that im satisfied because I like a firm couch, its cute and practical...I just hope it doesn't break, and i dont think its wrestler friendly unless yall are both lightweights lol 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It is firm, but it's lovely and nice to the touch. Went together perfectly and easily. The back is low, so it's not for super lounging. But it's nice enough, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its exactly as advertised
reviews.reviewText: It was a super easy fit into sockets installation. It took barely 15 minutes to put together. And that too was because we were trying the wrong way till I noticed the installation guide indicated that the seat fits into the handles. We were instead trying to fit the handle into the seat. Once we rectified this error it took all of 5 minutes to fit it in. I held the handle straight from the ground up and husband lifted the seat and wedged it into the slots.The seating is comfortable, the look is plush and it definitely looks way more expensive than the actual cost of the product.Although I must add, that I have not bought it for heavy traffic area. But for the price point, I am extremely satisfied with both the quality and final look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ships with Fedex..
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this couch thinking I would receive it in 2 days as advertised. Didn't receive it until a week later as FedEx doesn't follow delivery instructions. The second attempt of delivery was much better. If you live in an apartment building, beware of this possible issue. Outside of the delivery delays and frustration, it is a very beautiful couch and I was able to put it together by myself. I'm 5'4.5", 125 lbs. I was not able to carry this package (it is 84 lbs) to my apartment and had to remove the base of the couch from the box to bring up first before returning for the other pieces using a cart. I didn't have a dolly. Again, just FYI.. The easiest way to put this couch together on your own, is to first put the legs into the arm pieces. Then place a left or right arm piece on the floor and slide the base downward into the slats. When you attach the second arm piece, you can push it into the base slats from the top. Once you flip it over and sit on it, the base will secure itself into the slats. Bouncing helps. The base should always go down, into the arm pieces. If you try to do it another way, the base WILL fall out of the slats. The back piece is slightly tricky; don't try to pick up the couch from the back piece. It will slide out. The cushions are fluffing out more each day and the material of the couch does not feel cheap. If you like a firm yet soft mattress, you will enjoy this couch. Very emerald/forest green. I love it.
